attributes_config.name: bonus_defense_reduction
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Defense reduction on target for &svalue instance(s)

attributes_config.name: bonus_attack_reduction
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Attack reduction on target for &svalue instance(s)

attributes_config.name: bonus_heal_on_hit_chance
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Chance for &svalue% heal on getting hit

attributes_config.name: bonus_bleed_chance
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Chance to apply Bleed for &svalue instance(s)

attributes_config.name: bonus_confuse_chance
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Chance to apply Confuse for &svalue instance(s)

attributes_config.name: bonus_consumable_drop
attributes_config.text: &mod&value Consumable drop(s) per day when foraging

attributes_config.name: bonus_item_drop
attributes_config.text: &mod&value Item drop(s) per day when foraging

attributes_config.name: bonus_mana_surge_chance
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Chance to apply Mana Surge for &svalue instance(s)

attributes_config.name: bonus_high_cost_chance
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Chance to apply High Cost for &svalue instance(s)

attributes_config.name: bonus_silence_chance
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Chance to apply Silence for &svalue instance(s)

attributes_config.name: bonus_disarm_chance
attributes_config.text: &value&postfix Chance to apply Disarm for &svalue instance(s)

attack_item.name: Epic Bow of the Unicorn
attack_item.description: Blessed by unicorns, this bow releases ethereal arrows that pierce through darkness, harnessing the essence of purity and magic in Arborethia.

defense_item.name: Epic Giant Cookie Shield
defense_item.description: Last christmas I gave you my cookie, but this year I give it to your Uncle. You didnt eat it anyway. It's hard as a wooden shield – Granny

special_item.name: Magic Old Socks
special_item.description: Lord have mercy with the foolish mook who will find these abomination. The smell, the look, the feel – unbareble for a mortal apparel.

defense_item.name: Magic Shield
defense_item.description: The Shield, crafted with nature's strength, stands as an unwavering defense, safeguarding the mushroom warriors and Arborethia's tree of life.
